feed.title: Track Asdf Plugins Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: Convenience shortname repository for asdf community plugins

entry.title: Asdf Plugins Updates on Feb 13 - Feb 19, 2023
entry.content:
Contributing a new Plugin / asdf-community

  • Install repo dependencies: asdf install
  • Add the plugin to the repository README.md Plugin List table.
  • Create a file with the shortname you wish to be used by asdf in plugins/<name>. The contents should be repository = <your_repo>.
    • eg: printf "repository = https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf-nodejs.git\n" > plugins/nodejs
  • Test your code : scripts/test_plugin.bash --file plugins/<name>
  • Format your code & this README: scripts/format.bash
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Feb 13 - Feb 19, 2023

entry.title: Asdf Plugins Updates on Jul 12 - Jul 18, 2021
entry.content:
Creating a new Plugin

  • Consider using our Template (⭐121) which has the core functionality to tools published to GitHub releases and CI for GitHub/GitLab/CircleCI out of the box.

Contributing a new Plugin / asdf-community

  • Create a PR following the instructions in the PR template.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 12 - Jul 18, 2021
